title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah’s Air Defense System in Response to Aircraft Downed: Inside the Military Actions in Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked in the Bealbek area deep in Lebanon, three military infrastructure of Hezbollah’s air defense system.

Earlier tonight, fighter jets attacked a military complex and three additional military infrastructures of the air defense system that served the Hezbollah terrorist organization in the Bealbek area, in response to the downing of an Air Force aircraft last night (Sat).

In addition, yesterday (Sat), during the day, fighter jets attacked a terror infrastructure and a military structure of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in the areas of Ayta ash-Shab and Al Adaisseh, also the IDF attacked with artillery fire during the day in the Yaatar area.
